title: Creative/Survival
briefDescription: As you can see in the title, I made a world that haves 2 command blocks that lets you change your gamemode to survival/creative with ...

crawledImageUrls.text: As you can see in the title, I made a world that haves 2 command blocks that lets you change your gamemode to survival/creative with achievements enabled, Yes achievements are enabled here, This can work for farming achievements or getting achievements with friends.

title: Teleporting Maze!
briefDescription: Like mazes? This maze contains outside walls that lead to anywhere. There will be dead-ends and pressure plates that teleport you closer to the exit ...

crawledImageUrls.text: Like mazes? This maze contains outside walls that lead to anywhere. There will be dead-ends and pressure plates that teleport you closer to the exit or to a random spot on the map!

title: Hide and Seek Made By Kaden (Kingdom)
briefDescription: Another brand new map coming to Minecraft! Just the right map to play with your friends. Hide and seek! Hide and Seek is a fun ...

crawledImageUrls.text: Another brand new map coming to Minecraft! Just the right map to play with your friends. Hide and seek! Hide and Seek is a fun game to play on Minecraft. If you love minigames I suggest you download the map and try it out for your self.

title: Castle Siege [Minigame]
briefDescription: A fun and addicating minigame. Fight and steal enemy's mascot, and also protect your own too, this map can be played singleplayer or multiplayer with ...

crawledImageUrls.text:
A fun and addicating minigame. Fight and steal enemy?s mascot, and also protect your own too, this map can be played singleplayer or multiplayer with friends! With working guard mobs!
You can play singleplayer (pve) or multiplayer with your friends, and all enemy guards are attacking you
The goal is to steal your enemy?s mascot at enemy?s castle and bring it to your castle to win
The mascot is in the shulker box
Place enemy?s mascot to your castle right here
You can also be a gate guard, you can unlock the role by completing an easy easter egg at the spawing place

title: SkyBlockBE
briefDescription: Have you ever wanted a modded skyblock bedrock map, well you found one, my first skyblock map for Minecraft: Bedrock Edition, with custom crafting recipes ...
Description:
This is the start of the map where all the crafting recipes are, now throw your compass and thrive the map finishes when you get a special item?
Remember, these are shapeless recipes, and you can do it in any order.

[c] [ ] [ ] [c] [ ] [ ] = [sr] [ ] [ ] [ ] [c] = Cobblestone [sr] = Stone Rod

crawledImageUrls.text: Have you ever wanted a modded skyblock bedrock map, well you found one, my first skyblock map for Minecraft: Bedrock Edition, with custom crafting recipes and custom textures!! A new skyblock experience without having to grind wood. In this map, you will be starting in a room with most of the recipes being shown on the walls and you will have a stone pickaxe(nearly broken) and 10 stone. throw the compasses to teleport to areas. Now have fun!!!
This is the Island you start on. Throw the compass called Teleport To Island to teleport here! Mine the cobble to get cobble then craft coal, iron, gold, redstone, lapis and eventually diamonds.
This is where you spawn, all the crafting recipes are here, also throw compasses to teleport also there are command blocks at the bottom (not all of them)

title: Slime Rancher (Public Beta)
briefDescription: 3 years and this game still hasn't lost it's charm. I've always wondered what it would be like to play slime rancher in Minecraft, and here ...

crawledImageUrls.text:
3 years and this game still hasn?t lost it?s charm. I?ve always wondered what it would be like to play slime rancher in Minecraft, and here we are! Keep in mind this is still in beta and I made this in like 5 days so there will be a lot of bugs. Expect major updates weekly.
Your standard slime! Generates XP every 10000 ticks.
Unlike the actual game, phosphor slimes spawn during the day and can go out in sunlight. Generates XP every 9000 ticks.
Rock slimes are extremely slow, but can hurt you pretty bad with their spikes. Generates XP every 8000 ticks.
The cutest of the bunch, but also the most ferocious. Keep your distance while capturing! Generates XP every 7500 ticks.
The puddle slime is a slime that can only be found on Ring Island. The teleporter to this place can be activated by feeding the tabby gordo [may be broken]. Keep them in the pond at your ranch. Generates XP every 7000 ticks,
While in game they do explode, in this map they do not. Why? Because they would explode and die when you would try and feed them. Generates XP every 6500 ticks.

They pack a punch, then they split! If you?re planning on capturing these guys, split them into their tiny harmless version. Then you?ll have a ton of little money makers! Generates XP every 6000 ticks.
Rad slimes are the best slimes in game for the time being! These will chase you trying to attack you, but they?re pretty harmless. Even their radiation dosn?t do much good. Can be found on ash isle and parts of the Indigo Quarry. Generates XP every 5500 ticks.
Hunter slimes are less rare that rad slimes, but can deal more damage. Can be found in the Moss Blanket. Be careful Generates XP every 5500 ticks.

Honey slimes are semi-rare, only being found in honey perch. Generates XP every 5000 ticks.
When lightning strikes a pink slime, it will turn into a mosaic slime! Useless for the time being.

Two Dispensers can be found east of your ranch house. The left gives you the Vacpack 1.0 and 2.0 while the right gives you elytra. The Vackpac 1.0 shoots tethers at the slimes, while the 2.0 can pick up slimes and push them through things like corral walls.
You can also find a pond and a coop to the right of them. [The button on the coop collects the eggs and places them where shown.]
There are twenty gardens west of your ranch house. This time around you?ll need to find the food in the wild! You can find a golden hoe in your ranch house.

There are two regular corrals, one with an air net, and one with a solar shield. All of them have auto-feeders and XP Collectors. To put slimes in, make sure there is food in the auto-feeder, pick up the slimes with the 2.0, and put them in the corral! A video is shown below on how to do this.

There are two types of gordos, Slime key gordos and static teleporter gordos. Key gordos spawn a key in its mouth when fully fed, and static teleporter gordos activate the nearest red teleporter. Most of the time these teleporters will lead to an island or back to the ranch.

title: Stone Blocked
briefDescription: Stone Blocked is kinda like skyblock but instead you are under ground. You start off with a wooden pickaxe and some other materials and you ...

crawledImageUrls.text: Stone Blocked is kinda like skyblock but instead you are under ground. You start off with a wooden pickaxe and some other materials and you are ready to explore the endless stone world.

title: Souls (BedWars Mingame)
briefDescription: This is a exiting action packed map full of fun! Play with up to 4 friends in a P.V.P. fight to the death! This ...

crawledImageUrls.text: This is a exiting action packed map full of fun! Play with up to 4 friends in a P.V.P. fight to the death! This map is a remade version of bed wars with a twist; if your soul dies, you do too!!!

There are two game modes in the map souls. (Switchable in lobby) Chaos and normal modes. In normal mode you acquire normal gear. (Iron gear) In Chaos mode you acquire extreme gear. (Diamond Gear) Game modes also impact the upgrades you get from emeralds.
